official_title: A bill to suspend for one year the authority of the Secretary of Transportation to sell Conrail.

summary.text: Conrail Sale Date Deferment Act - Amends the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from selling the Consolidated Rail Corporation until one year after the date of enactment of this Act. (Currently, the Secretary is authorized to make such sale after June 1, 1984.)

titles.title: A bill to suspend for one year the authority of the Secretary of Transportation to sell Conrail.
